title: madhvarAya guru
sahitya:
madhvarAya guru madhvarAya madhvarAya guru madhvarAya


caraNam 1    rAmAvatAradolomme madhvarAya shrI mahA hanumanAdyO madhvarAya
vAma muSTili rAvaNan gedyO madhvarAya kAmitArta surarigidyO madhvarAya
    caraNam 2    krSNAvatAradolamme madhvarAya diTTa kali bhImanAdyO madhvarAya 
kuTTidyO kauravanalla madhvarAya shrI krSNana hitava paDedyO madhvarAya
    caraNam 3    dhareyoLu yatiyAgi janisidyO madhvarAya guru vyAsara hitava paDedyoo madhvarAya 
duruL mAyimatava muridyO madhvarAya purandara viTTalana dAsanAdyO madhvarAya
